mapper.select: select * from sale_returns_sheet order by id desc limit 0,1;
mapper.insert: insert into sale_returns_sheet (id, sale_sheet_id, supplier, salesman, operator, remark, total_amount, final_amount, discount, voucher_amount, state, create_time) values (#{id},#{saleSheetId},#{supplier},#{salesman},#{operator},#{remark},#{totalAmount},#{finalAmount},#{discount},#{voucherAmount},#{state}, #{createTime})

insert into sale_returns_sheet_content (sale_returns_sheet_id, pid, quantity, unit_price, total_price, remark) values
(#{item.saleReturnsSheetId},#{item.pid},#{item.quantity},#{item.unitPrice},#{item.totalPrice},#{item.remark})
mapper.select: SELECT sale_returns_sheet.create_time,product.name,product.type,sale_returns_sheet_content.quantity,sale_returns_sheet_content.unit_price,sale_returns_sheet_content.total_price,sale_returns_sheet.id FROM sale_returns_sheet,sale_returns_sheet_content,product WHERE sale_returns_sheet.id=sale_returns_sheet_content.sale_returns_sheet_id AND sale_returns_sheet_content.pid=product.id AND (sale_returns_sheet.create_time>=#{begin} OR #{begin} is null)AND (sale_returns_sheet.create_time<=#{end} OR #{end} is null)AND (product.name=#{name} OR #{name} is null)AND (sale_returns_sheet.supplier=#{supplier} OR #{supplier} is null)AND (sale_returns_sheet.operator=#{operator} OR #{operator} is null);

select * from sale_returns_sheet where state = '审批完成' AND (sale_returns_sheet.create_time>=#{begin} OR #{begin} is null)AND (sale_returns_sheet.create_time<=#{end} OR #{end} is null)AND (sale_returns_sheet.supplier=#{customerId} OR #{customerId} is null)AND (sale_returns_sheet.operator=#{operator} OR #{operator} is null);
select * from sale_returns_sheet where sale_sheet_id = #{saleSheetId} limit 1;
